subject: Olympic Games
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee has signed the Deloitte tax and financial services company as a sponsor. The U.S.O.C., working hard to retain sponsors in the rough economy, signed Deloitte through 2012. It is the 18th company under contract for the next four years. Financial terms were not disclosed, but most U.S.O.C. sponsors pay between $10 million and $15 million for a four-year deal.
